Purpose: To measure Eucalyptus-specific Immunoglobulin E (IgE) levels in serum for allergy assessment.
Container: Red-top tube or Serum Separator Tube (SST)
Equipment: Centrifuge, Immunoassay analyzer (e.g., ELISA reader or Chemiluminescence Immunoassay analyser), Micropipettes and tips, Vortex mixer
